author: Alex Brown
text:
Section 511 of the Tax Increase Prevention and Reconciliation Act of 2005 contains a provision that requires that federal, state, and local governments withhold 3% from nearly all contract payments for goods and services. If it is not repealed the 3% withholding provision will effect payments made after December 31, 2012. 
How would this requirement impact operations in your government? Will it impact cash flow and hiring decisions, or will it be a significant paperwork and reporting nightmare?
For more information: http://icma.org/en/Page/100279/3_Withholding_Requirement
title: Effects of 3% Withholding Requirement
